00025 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetEnergyA() const
00026 {
00027    UChar_t chId = GetChannelId();
00028 
00029    return fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetEnergyA(fChannel.fAmpltd, chId);

00034 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetKinEnergyA()
00035 {
00036    UChar_t chId  = GetChannelId();
00037    Float_t emeas = GetEnergyA();
00038    Float_t eloss = fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(chId).fAvrgEMiss;
00039    return  emeas + eloss;
00040 }

00044 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetKinEnergyAEDepend()
00045 {
00046    UChar_t chId    = GetChannelId();
00047    Float_t emeas   = GetEnergyA();
00048    Float_t dlwidth = fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(chId).fDLWidth;
00049    return  cnipol_toolkit::ekin(emeas, dlwidth);
00050 }

00063 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetKinEnergyAEstimate()
00064 {

00070 
00072 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetKinEnergyADLCorrEstimate()
00073 {
00074    Float_t emeas = GetEnergyA();
00075    Float_t eloss = fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(0).fAvrgEMiss;
00076    Float_t eMeasDLCorr = fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(0).fEMeasDLCorr;
00077 
00078    return  emeas*eMeasDLCorr + eloss;
00079 }

00092 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetFunnyEnergyA()
00093 {
00094    float   emeas  = GetEnergyA();

00101 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetEnergyI()
00102 {
00103    UChar_t chId = fEventId.fChannelId + 1;
00104    // XXX acoef has to be changed to ... icoef
00105    //return fEventConfig->fConfigInfo->data.chan[chId].acoef * fChannel.fIntgrl;
00106    return fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(chId).fAmInt.fCoef * fChannel.fIntgrl;
00107 }

00111 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetTime() const
00112 {
00113    return WFD_TIME_UNIT_HALF * (fChannel.fTdc + fEventConfig->fRandom->Rndm() - 0.5);
00114 }

00118 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetTime2() const
00119 {
00120    return WFD_TIME_UNIT_HALF * fChannel.fTdc;
00121 }

00125 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetTimeOfFlight()
00126 {
00127    UChar_t chId   = GetChannelId();
00128    Float_t t0coef = fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(chId).fT0Coef;
00129 
00130    return GetTime() + t0coef;
00131 }

00135 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetTimeOfFlight2()
00136 {
00137    UChar_t chId   = GetChannelId();
00138    Float_t t0coef = fEventConfig->fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(chId).fT0Coef;
00139

00152 
00154 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetCarbonMass()
00155 {
00156    UChar_t chId = GetChannelId();
00157    Float_t tof  = GetTimeOfFlight();
00158    Float_t mass = tof * tof * GetKinEnergyAEDepend() * gRunConsts[chId].T2M * k2G;
00159    return mass;
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00164 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetCarbonMassEstimate()
00165 {
00166    //UChar_t chId = GetChannelId();
00167    Float_t tof  = GetTimeOfFlightEstimate();
00168    Float_t mass = tof * tof * GetKinEnergyAEstimate() * gRunConsts[0].T2M * k2G;
00169    return mass;
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00174 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetMandelstamT()
00175 {
00176    return -2 * MASS_12C * k2G * GetKinEnergyAEstimate() * k2G; // t = -2ME
00177 }
00178 
00179 
00181 Float_t ChannelEvent::GetTdcAdcTimeDiff()
00182 {
00183    UChar_t chId  = GetChannelId();
00184    Float_t delta = GetTimeOfFlight2() - gRunConsts[chId].E2T/sqrt(GetKinEnergyAEDepend());
00185 
00186    return delta;
00187 }

00204 Bool_t ChannelEvent::PassCutRawAlpha()
00205 {
00206    if (fChannel.fAmpltd < 50) return false;
00207 
00208    if (fChannel.fTdc < 15 || fChannel.fTdc > 50) return false;
00209 
00210    return true;
00211 }

00225 Bool_t ChannelEvent::PassCutDepEnergyTime()
00226 {
00227    switch (gMeasInfo->fPolId) {
00228 
00229    case 0:   // B1U
00230       return true;
00231       break;
00232 
00233    case 1:   // Y1D
00234       if ( GetEnergyA() < 200 || GetEnergyA() > 1000)// || GetTime() < 15 || GetTime() > 75)
00235           //(GetTime() + gMeasInfo->GetExpectedGlobalTimeOffset()) < 15 ||
00236           //(GetTime() + gMeasInfo->GetExpectedGlobalTimeOffset()) > 75)
00237          return false;
00238       break;
00239 
00240    case 2:   // B2D
00241       if ( GetEnergyA() < 200 || GetEnergyA() > 1000)// || GetTime() < 15 || GetTime() > 75)
00242          return false;
00243       break;
00244 
00245    case 3:   // Y2U
00246       return true;
00247       break;
00248    }
00249 
00250    return true;
00251 }

00285 Bool_t ChannelEvent::PassCutCarbonMass()
00286 {
00287    if (fabs(GetCarbonMass() - MASS_12C * k2G) < 2.0*CARBON_MASS_PEAK_SIGMA*k2G )
00288       return true;
00289 
00290    return false;
00291 }
00292 
00293 
00295 Bool_t ChannelEvent::PassCutCarbonMassEstimate()
00296 {
00297    if (fabs(GetCarbonMassEstimate() - MASS_12C * k2G) < 3.0*CARBON_MASS_PEAK_SIGMA*k2G )
00298       return true;
00299 
00300    return false;
00301 }

00305 Bool_t ChannelEvent::PassCutPulser()
00306 {
00307    if ( GetAmpltd() < gMeasInfo->GetPulserCutAdcMax() &&
00308         GetAmpltd() > gMeasInfo->GetPulserCutAdcMin() &&
00309         GetTdc() < gMeasInfo->GetPulserCutTdcMax() &&
00310         GetTdc() > gMeasInfo->GetPulserCutTdcMin()
00311       )
00312       return false;
00313 
00314    return true;
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00319 Bool_t ChannelEvent::PassCutNoise()
00320 {
00321    Double_t extraOffset = 0;
00322 
00323    if ( gMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergy() != kINJECTION)
00324       extraOffset = -8; // 8 TDC units ~= ? ns, 6 TDC units ~= 8 ns
00325 
00326    if ( GetAmpltd() < gMeasInfo->GetProtoCutAdcMin() ||
00327         GetAmpltd() > gMeasInfo->GetProtoCutAdcMax() ||
00328         GetTdc() < gMeasInfo->GetProtoCutTdcMin() ||
00329         GetTdc() > gMeasInfo->GetProtoCutTdcMax() ||
00330         fabs( GetTdc() - ( gMeasInfo->GetProtoCutSlope() * GetAmpltd() + gMeasInfo->GetProtoCutOffset() + extraOffset) ) >
00331            gMeasInfo->GetProtoCutWidth()
00332       )
00333       return false;
00334 
00335    return true;
00336 }

00347 Bool_t ChannelEvent::PassCutTargetChannel()
00348 {
00349    UShort_t chId = GetChannelId();
00350 
00351    //if (chId > gConfigInfo->data.NumChannels-4 && chId <= gConfigInfo->data.NumChannels)
00352    if (chId > NSTRIP && chId <= NSTRIP+4)
00353       return true;
00354 
00355   return false;
00356 }
